item.title: 康菲石油公司将美国墨西哥湾沿岸液化天然气纳入全球业务组合
item.description: 美国能源巨头签署 SPA 协议，将从 NextDecade 公司在美国的格兰德河液化项目中获取液化量【原文：US energy giant signs SPA to take volumes from NextDecade's Rio Grande liquefaction project in the US】

item.title: 部长称匈牙利与壳牌签署长期天然气协议
item.description: Peter Szijjarto 在米兰举行的 Gastech 会议上告诉与会者，匈牙利的能源优先事项由 "基础设施和地理位置 "决定【原文：Peter Szijjarto told audience at Gastech conference in Milan that Hungary’s energy priorities dictated by ‘infrastructure and geography’】

item.title: Taqa 将就英国北海资产剥离案提起上诉
item.description: 去年 12 月，英国高等法院驳回了 Taqa Bratani 对 Viaro Energy 的索赔要求。【原文：Taqa Bratani's claim against Viaro Energy was dismissed by the English high court in December last year.】

item.title: 原油攀升，制裁担忧超过欧佩克+温和增产的影响
item.description: 原油期货周一在欧洲交易时段上涨约 2%，原因是欧佩克+的增产预期小于之前的减产逆转。【原文：Crude oil futures trading around 2% higher in European trade on Monday as anticipated Opec+ output increase smaller than previous reversals to production cuts】
